title: Busch Gardens Christmas
description: A festive Christmas wreath with a glowing lantern at its center, surrounded by green ornaments.

title: Northern Lights in Williamsburg
description: A rare view of the aurora borealis painting the suburban night sky in shades of purple and blue.

title: Wood Art Sculpture
description: An intricate lattice of white wooden beams creates a complex interplay of light, shadow, and geometric patterns.

title: Back Yard Sunset
description: A vibrant, colorful sunset breaks through the clouds over a peaceful suburban backyard.

title: Smiling Kid Portrait
description: A sweet and gentle portrait of a smiling child, framed by a soft, natural background.

title: DC Cherry Blossoms
description: The Washington Monument peeks through a brilliant explosion of white cherry blossoms against a clear blue sky.

title: Woman with Cocktail
description: A candid moment, capturing a playful glance over a refreshing pink cocktail.

title: Hawaiian Dinner
description: A close-up of a delicious bowl of noodle soup with vibrant char siu pork.

title: Cosplay with Chell
description: A fun selfie with a cosplayer holding a Portal gun, captured at a convention.

title: Cajun Dinner
description: A beautifully plated tower of jambalaya, ready to be enjoyed at Jacques-Imo's.

title: Mardi Gras Royalty
description: Posing with the towering King and Queen of Mardi Gras at Busch Gardens.

title: Starry Sky
description: A clear night sky reveals constellations and a faint nebula above the silhouette of a treetop.

title: Jellyfish
description: A translucent jellyfish drifts through a vibrant blue void, its delicate tentacles trailing behind.

title: At the Soundboard
description: Focused concentration at the mixing board, bathed in the cool light of the studio.

title: Shooting Star
description: A fleeting meteor streaks across the deep blue twilight sky above a quiet treeline.

title: Kuiper Satellite Cluster
description: A train of satellites crosses the night, a line of light against a field of faint star trails.

title: Urban Explorer
description: A portrait alive with color and character, set against a warm, sunlit alley.

title: Cherry Blossoms
description: A delicate cluster of cherry blossoms bursts forth, set against a soft-focus sky.

title: Lost Highway
description: Headlights approach on a dark road at dusk, splitting the monochrome landscape.

title: The Big Dipper
description: The familiar asterism of the Big Dipper hangs clearly in the night sky above the treetops.

title: Comet
description: A faint comet and its tail are just visible over the silhouette of a house at twilight.

title: Presidential Head
description: The weathered and cracked visage of a presidential statue stares forward, a monument in decay.

title: Solar Eclipse
description: The crescent of a solar eclipse glows with a warm, hazy corona against the stark blackness of the sky.

title: Orion and Friends
description: The familiar constellation Orion stands out in a field of stars, a landmark in the deep night.

title: Full Moon
description: A detailed and textured view of the lunar surface, stark and beautiful against the blackness of space.

title: Spring Blossoms
description: Dense clusters of white blossoms reach into a bright, clear turquoise sky.

title: Hibiscus Bloom
description: A macro view into the heart of a hibiscus flower, revealing a vivid gradient from yellow to deep pink.

title: A Delicate Balance
description: A moment of serene impossibility, with stones stacked precariously against the ocean's shore.

title: Arch Against the Sky
description: The smooth, sweeping curve of a monument against a vast and wispy blue sky.

title: Stone Stairs
description: Minimalist architecture in stone and glass, focusing on the clean lines and angles of a modern staircase.

title: By the Pool
description: A vibrant close-up of a palm frond, its repeating lines creating a pattern of brilliant green.

title: Whale Shark Exclamation Point
description: Sunlight filters through the water, illuminating the immense form of a whale shark below.

title: Pass the Peanut Butter
description: Ethereal jellyfish trail delicate tentacles through an impossibly blue deep.

title: Tate Observatory Telescope
description: A vintage telescope points skyward inside the intricate dome of an observatory.

title: Orion's Belt
description: Long exposure captures the gentle arc of stars trailing through a deep magenta night sky.

title: Framed Basilica
description: A study in composition, with a distant basilica perfectly framed by a rustic, silhouetted sculpture.

title: Girl at Door
description: A quiet, contemplative moment against the stark white texture of a weathered, snow-dusted door.

title: Fireworks at the Taste
description: Vibrant bursts of light illuminate a festive night, with a Ferris wheel standing sentinel over the celebration.

title: Girl at Pole
description: A portrait alive with color, where fiery red hair contrasts with the cool, smooth lines of an urban setting.

title: Girl on Stairs
description: Sun-bleached highlights catch the light as the subject gazes away, framed by the repeating lines of stone steps.

title: Bottom of a Sculpture
description: An abstract, high-contrast view of intersecting industrial forms, exploring shape and negative space.

title: Girl at Wall
description: A soft-focus portrait capturing a subtle expression, with warm and cool tones blending in the background.

title: Girl at Window
description: A candid moment of curiosity, as the subject peers into the weathered frame of an old window.

title: Girl on Pillar
description: A playful and direct gaze, where vibrant yellow in the foreground and hair creates a striking color harmony.
